title: Putham Pudhu Kaalai Lyrics Alaigal Oivathillai
stanzas:
Putham Pudhu Kaalai Song Lyrics Alaigal Oivathillai
#Ilaiyaraja #SJanaki #GangaiAmaran

Putham pudhu kaalai
ponnira velai
en vazhvile
dhina thorum thondrum
sugam raagam kaetkum
ennaalum aanandham

ilam poovai
nenjil thondrum
adhu thaan thaazhamo
manadhil aasaigal
malarin kolangal

Putham pudhu kaalai
ponnira velai
en vazhvile
dhina thorum thondrum
sugam raagam kaetkum
ennaalum aanandham
